title: Twitch Reinstates Trump - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.22.24
description:
Head over to KindaFunny.com/store to pick up something from the new line of Portillo merch!

Tim and Roger talk about the state of Twitch bans, Bethesda unionizing, and the Cybertruck coming to Fortnite.

 - Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
     - The Devolver Game you have to play – that’s right, we’re previewing Neva on YouTube, Twitch, and podcast services.
     - Nick’s Clickolding on YouTube and Twitch.
 - If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
     - Today’s Gregway is a Greg-AND-Gen-Way! That’s right, the Millers are in the car together this morning!
     - And you can get the Kinda Funny Podcast this afternoon where we’re talking about yet ANOTHER historic event we’re all living through. It’ll be up tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.
